title: My club is back, but somehow I was removed from being leader.
body:
Greetings!

Recently, my club on the NA server "The Men Who Giggle" (tag: FISH!) was restored. The roster seems in place (a few people who left were re-added, but nothing big), and the ranks were correct. The only problem, however, is that I am no longer the leader. In fact, the club has no leader now. I do not know if it is related, but about 4 months ago I left the club for approximately 2 weeks. I was given leadership back when I rejoined.

replies.body: This may be due to some club issues we've been seeing since clubs were restored after some [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look into this for you.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
